content.rendered:
EVENT FLORIST

Elevate your business with weekly fresh flower arrangements or stunning floral displays for your next corporate event on the Gold Coast, courtesy of LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio, your trusted event florist in the Gold Coast. Stand out within your industry by embracing our seasonal style, tailored to enhance your brand image. 

Let LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio curate bespoke floral arrangements for your boutique office space, reception counter, boardroom, and foyer, or for your upcoming corporate event. 

Schedule a complimentary consultation with us to discuss all your floral needs.

With love, Rach x

Event Enquiry

This form is currently undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.

OFFICE FLOWER DELIVERY AND CORPORATE FLORAL ARRANGEMENTS ON THE GOLD COAST

At LULLY & ROSE, we’re committed to making your events truly memorable with our floral expertise. Specialising in event floristry, we provide flower arrangements and styling for various occasions, from birthdays to corporate functions. Our services include corporate flower delivery, arrangements, event flowers, and decoration, ensuring we meet your needs with creativity and attention to detail.

For corporate events like galas or product launches, our flower designs add elegance and natural beauty. We also offer party decoration with flowers, creating an inviting atmosphere that reflects your brand’s essence. Whether it’s a themed party or a business opening, our flower arrangements express sophistication and seasonal beauty.

We believe in the lasting impact of flowers, which is why we collaborate closely with you to design customised table arrangements and decor that capture your event’s essence.

Let us be your partners in transforming your vision into reality. Contact us today to begin your floral journey with LULLY & ROSE. Discover more about our other services here.
